dct_description_sm: auctore Ioan Baptista Aleotti, alias l'Argenta ; Illustrissimo Domino D. Hieronymo Giliolio Comiti Trignani & c Patrono Colendiss.
North oriented toward right of sheet.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
From Ortelius' Theatrum Orbis Terrarum, Spanish edition ("Theatro del Mondo di Abrahamo Ortelio"), Vrients, 1612.
